Translations.Text: Hav vi not those pest hypocrisy kaj kiel ili dir al their companions disbelief among des popol scripture vi evicted ni ir vi neniam obe anyone opposes vi! anyone batal vi ni batal your flank. DI bor witness ili est liars
En fakt, se ili evicted ili ne ir them kaj anyone batal them ili ne supported them. Eben ili supported them ili would torn around fled Ili neniam win
Ja vi strik plur terror their kor than their tim DI. This est ili est popol who ne comprehend

Ili ne get together batal vi ili est well-shielded buildings behind mur! Their might aper formidable among themselves. Vi opini ili united when en fakt their kor divid. This est ili est popol who ne kompren
Their sort est sam as their counterparts preceded them. Ili sufer consequences their decisions. Ili incurred painful retribution
Ili est diabl li dir al human est Disbelieve tiam as baldaux as li disbelieves li dir mi disown vi! Mi tim DI Lord univers
destiny por ambaux them est Hellfire wherein ili abide forever This est requital transgressors
O vi kred vi reverence DI let cxiu anim ekzamen ki gxi send ahead por morgaux. Vi reverence DI; DI est fully Cognizant de cxio vi do
Ne est those forges DI Li far them forges! These est des wicked
Ne egal est dwellers de Hellfire dwellers de Paradise; dwellers Paradise est winners
Ni revealed this Quran mont vi seg gxi trem cxif reverence DI! Ni cite these ekzempl popol ke ili reflect
Li est 1 DI; tie ne est ali di Him. Knower de all sekret declarations. Li est plej Gracious Merciful
Li est 1 DI; tie ne est ali di Him. Regx plej Sankt Pac plej Fidel Supreme Almighty plej Powerful plej Dignified DI GLOR; far HAV partners
Li est 1 DI; Creator Initiator Designer. Al Him aparten plej bel nom! Glor Him est cxio heavens ter! Li est Almighty Sagx

O vi kred vi ne befriend My enemies your enemies etend am friendship them ecx ili disbelieved truth ven vi! Ili persekut messenger vi just vi kred en DI your Lord Vi mobilize barakt en My kauxz streb My blessings kiel vi secretly am them? Mi est fully aware da cxio vi conceal cxio vi deklar. Those among vi do this hav ja strayed dekstr path
Whenever ili renkont vi ili trakt vi enemies dolor vi their man lang! Ili want vi disbelieve
Your relativ your mon neniam help vi. Tag Resurrection Li jugx vi. DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do

Bon ekzempl set por vi Abraham those him. Ili dir al their popol Ni disown vi idols vi worship DI. Ni denunc vi vi seg nothing el us animosity hatred vi kred en DI SOL. mistake committed Abraham when li dir al his patr mi pregx your forgiveness mi ne posed potenc protekt vi el DI. Our Lord ni fid en Vi submit Vi; Vi est final destiny
Our Lord not oppressed those disbelieved forgive us! Vi est Almighty Sagx
Bon ekzempl set them those streb DI Last Tag. As por those turn DI est en ne bezon (de them) Praiseworthy
